relation: Number of distinct values in the column
Number of nulls in the column
Number of buckets in histogram for the column
Sample size used in analyzing this column
Date on which this column was most recently analyzed
Indicates whether column statistics were collected for the partition as a whole (YES) or were estimated from statistics on underlying subpartitions (NO)
Indicates whether statistics were entered directly by the user (YES) or not (NO)
Average length of the column (in bytes)
Indicates existence/type of histogram: NONE FREQUENCY HEIGHT BALANCED
textBeforeTable: USER_PART_COL_STATISTICS provides such information for all partitions of tables owned by the current user. This view does not display the OWNER column. DBA_PART_COL_STATISTICS provides such information for all table partitions in the database. Related Views ALL_PART_COL_STATISTICS provides column statistics and histogram information for table partitions accessible to the current user.
